===Verb===
{{zh-verb}}

# to [[graduate]]; to [[finish]] [[school]]
#: {{zh-x|我 去年 中學 畢業 了。|I '''graduated''' from high school last year.}}

====Usage notes====
Unlike its English equivalent ''graduate'', {{zh-l|畢業}} implies not only an event but a state. Note the following example sentence:

{{zh-x|我 畢業 兩 年 了。|I '''graduated''' two years ago.}}

Literally: "I have graduated for two years."

===Noun===
{{zh-noun}}

# [[graduation]]
#: {{zh-x|畢業 以來|since '''graduation'''}}
